      • addPermission

        public void addPermission(java.lang.String doorId,
                          java.lang.String userId)
        Saves the permission to persistent data. DOES NOT handle adding the user to the door's user list. However, the next time the specified door is requested the permission will be present
        Parameters:
        userId - id of the user being granted permission
        doorId - id of the door being granted permission to

      • addDoor

      • addSwipeRecord

        public void addSwipeRecord(java.lang.String userId,
                           java.lang.String doorId,
                           java.time.LocalDateTime date,
                           boolean result)
        Adds a swipe record to the database
        Parameters:
        userId - id of the user that swiped
        doorId - id of the door that was swiped on
        date - date of the swipe
        result - whether or not the user was permitted entry

        Parameters:
